summary: A rumbunctious and ribald tale of a troupe of travelling actors who alternate highlights of kabuki theatre with strip shows.
cast: Osamu Takizawa|Shin'ichi Yanagisawa|Hiroyuki Nagato|Kô Nishimura|Toshio Takahara|Shôjirô Ogasawara|Tomio Aoki|Hiroshi Chiyoda|Ayako Fukuda|Isamu Horie|Ryûsei Itô|Minako Katsuki|Nobuo Kawakami|Dokô Kihara|Michie Kita|Hyôsuke Kobe|Asao Koike|Gen Mihama|Yôko Minamida|Sanpei Mine|Hisako Miyoshi|Kyôichi Mizuki|Midori Mori|Hisao Murata|Shôsei Mutô|Noboru Nakaya|Kimiko Nanazato|Shôichi Ozawa|Kayo Saitô|Ryoko Sakai|Minoru Sato|Aomi Shiba|Kimiko Shichiri|Kin Sugai|Masuyo Suzumura|Chigusa Takayama|Toyoko Takechi|Shuntarô Tamamura|Kazuji Uehara|Masako Urushizawa|Saroko Yagi|Junichi Yamanobe|Miyoko Yokoyama|Daisuke Ômi
title: Deseo desvanecido
